```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(jsonlite)
library(lubridate)
library(knitr)

load_race <- function(fn) {
    ll <- fromJSON(fn)
    bind_cols(ll$riders, race = ll$race, date = ymd(ll$start_date))
}
```

```{r load}
team <- fromJSON("team.json") %>%
    mutate(price=as.numeric(price))

races <- do.call(bind_rows, lapply(Sys.glob("race-*.json"), load_race))
```

```{r upcoming}
inner_join(team, races) %>% 
    filter(date >= today()) %>%
    select(date, race, name, team, price) %>%
    arrange(date, race, desc(price)) %>%
    kable()
```
